abstract_summ: We explore a standard epidemiological model, known as the SIRD model, to study the COVID-19 infection in India, and a few other countries around the world.We explore a standard epidemiological model, known as the SIRD model, to study the COVID-19 infection in India, and a few other countries around the world.The model is simulated aiming to project the probable features of the infection in India, various Indian states, and other countries.The model is simulated aiming to project the probable features of the infection in India, various Indian states, and other countries.We find that with the current infection rate and containment measures, the total active infection in India would be maximum at the end of June or beginning of July 2020.
title_summ: Globally Coherent Weekly Periodicity in the Covid-19 PandemicStudying the progress of COVID-19 outbreak in India using SIRD modelStudying the progress of COVID-19 outbreak in India using SIRD modelDistribution and growth rate of COVID-19 outbreak in Tamil Nadu: A log-linear regression approach.
